mapper.sql: delete_flag, address, mobile, email, sex, district, city, province, login_count, last_login_ip, last_login_time, avator, nick_name, salt, password, user_name, status, user_type, update_user_id, update_time, add_user_id, add_time, uuid, id
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_user SET delete_flag = #{deleteFlag}, address = #{address}, mobile = #{mobile}, email = #{email}, sex = #{sex}, district = #{district}, city = #{city}, province = #{province}, login_count = #{loginCount}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, avator = #{avator}, nick_name = #{nickName}, salt = #{salt}, password = #{password}, user_name = #{userName}, status = #{status}, user_type = #{userType}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_time = #{updateTime}, add_user_id = #{addUserId}, add_time = #{addTime} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE admin_user
delete_flag=#{deleteFlag},
address=#{address},
mobile=#{mobile},
email=#{email},
sex=#{sex},
district=#{district},
city=#{city},
province=#{province},
login_count=#{loginCount},
last_login_ip=#{lastLoginIp},
last_login_time=#{lastLoginTime},
avator=#{avator},
nick_name=#{nickName},
salt=#{salt},
password=#{password},
user_name=#{userName},
status=#{status},
user_type=#{userType},
update_user_id=#{updateUserId},
update_time=#{updateTime},
add_user_id=#{addUserId},
add_time=#{addTime}
WHERE id = #{id}
